header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Upcoming plans, Daily routines: mornings, Cruises, Travel, A family member and his wedding, Scotland, WWII – grandpa’s experience in RAF, Australia, Work, WWI and II, Race relations, Cultural differences, Fox hunting, Eating animals: ethics, Farming, A visitor- anecdote, The local area, Rowing, Punting, Opera
header.activity: A chat before leaving for home about travel
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements

speaker.fls: Spanish -- level unspecified; Japanese -- level unspecified
